name: Gold Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walk, 60 ft. fly, 30 ft. swim
description: A striking dragon with golden scales, known for its powerful presence.
memorable: Versatile abilities including fire immunity and potent breath attacks make it a formidable foe.
goals: Typically acts as a guardian or protector and may aid good-aligned adventurers.
relations: May interact with other dragons and can serve as a youthful ally or adversary.
environment: Found in mountainous regions or treasures hoards.
strengths: Elemental fire immunity and powerful breath weapons create tactical combat options.
weaknesses: While powerful, its intelligence and wisdom may limit strategic capabilities.
attacks: Features a Bite attack for piercing damage and two breath weapons with area effects.
most_powerful_ability: Breath weapons can either deal significant fire damage or weaken opponents significantly.
senses: Has blindsight out to 10 feet, allowing it to detect hidden threats nearby.
skills: Good at stealth with a +4 modifier, making it somewhat adept at remaining unnoticed.
additional_information: Amphibious, breathes both air and water.
Pounce ability can knock foes prone for advantage.
Two different breath attacks for versatility.
Strong physical and social presence from high Charisma.
test_queries: golden dragon with powerful breath attacks
majestic wyrmling that breathes fire and weakens foes
medium dragon with amphibious breathing and pounce attack
formidable dragon known for its fire immunity
gold dragon that protects treasure and fights bravely
